utilities

Class Vars

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Vars

  • public class Vars
extends Object
    This class has all the variables that are used the set the channels, slots or speed parameters for any object for BunnyBot 2012. We have a separate class just so we can change the channel more easily rather than searching through the class itself.
    Author:
    Fauzi
